summary: Website project (verithos.io): manage UI modal text without altering design; add SEO root files (robots.txt, sitemap.xml).
architectural_notes: SEO files must be placed in the website root: /robots.txt and /sitemap.xml; robots.txt should reference https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml.
known_issues: Possible regression: modal design appears changed after a text-only update; needs verification to ensure styles/layout remain unchanged.

existing_features.title:
Create a robots.txt file at the website root so it is publicly accessible at https://verithos.io/robots.txt, with exactly the following contents:

User-agent: *
Allow: /

Sitemap: https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml

Create a sitemap.xml file at the website root so it is publicly accessible at https://verithos.io/sitemap.xml, with exactly the following contents:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
   <url>
      <loc>https://verithos.io/</loc>
      <lastmod>2026-02-17</lastmod>
      <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
      <priority>1.0</priority>
   </url>
</urlset>

new_feature_requests.summary: Create robots.txt in site root with provided directives and sitemap link
